channel.title: CVE Feed for Trol InterMedia Sp. z o.o. Sp. k. -- 2ClickPortal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trol InterMedia Sp. z o.o. Sp. k. -- 2ClickPortal

item.title: CVE-2024-5961|2024-06-15T20:40:04.835Z -- trol%20intermedia%20sp.%20z%20o.o.%20sp.%20k. -- 2clickportal
item.description: Improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability in 2ClickPortal software allows reflected cross-site scripting (XSS). An attacker might trick somebody into using a crafted URL, which will cause a script to be run in user's browser. This issue affects 2ClickPortal software versions from 7.2.31 through 7.6.4.
